title: [Hearth's Desire, Gathering]
description: A sturdy framework of rope-bound planks supports the layers of boar hide and hard-packed earth insulating the interior of the expansive pavilion, the straw-covered ground draped in rectangles of canvas and rolled mats.  A circular fireplace rises at the center of the stone-encircled pit, its candle-covered mantel decorated with rows of carved steins.  Crates of supplies flank the tall counters along the periphery, the blanket-packed sundries and envelopes marked with wax seals.
